content: complimentary pattern sundrop dishcloth design by bobbi intveld pattern no for use with 202519 printed organic cotton worsted for use with printed organic cotton worsted sundrop dishcloth design by bobbi intveld description brighten up your kitchen with this beginner friendly dishcloth knit with 100% organic cotton this soft yet sturdy dishcloth is the perfect kitchen accessory experience level gauge in pattern 18 sts and 22 row = 4 beginner sizes finished measurements 9 one height 9 width materials yarn needles 5mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge printed organic cotton worsted size 8 100% certified organic cotton 100g/150yds 1 hank color shown no 2207 sundrop other tools tapestry needle p 02 blue sky fibers notes this dishcloth uses approximately 34 grams step no 1 dishcloth co 40 sts *k10 p10 repeat from * to end of row row 1-12 *p10 k10 repeat from * to end of row row 13-24 repeat last 24 row one more time bobble step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel abbreviations bobble bind off st s stitch es co cast on * repeat the directions between k knit the asterisks as many times as indicated p purl repeat repeat p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2025 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 05012025 p 04
